title: Children of the Musgraves (A)
creator_credit: Edmee Campbell-Dobbie, J. Campbell Dobbie and Peerless Films
brief_description: Filmed at Ernabella Mission Station in the Musgrave Ranges, 1000 miles north of Adelaide. Shows the life of Aborigines, their schooling and play, and their assimilation to white Australian ways. They are also given time each day to follow their own cultural traditions of hunting and cooking. Narrated by J.J. Hume.
